flagDescription: White beret caps worn by all members

affiliations.description: The White Berets serve as the lowest level of law enforcement under God Enel's army.

keyMoments.title: White Berets Confront the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The White Berets, led by Captain McKinley, arrive to arrest the Straw Hat Pirates for illegal entry into Skypiea. They serve as enforcers of Enel's laws.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the White Berets as the primary law enforcement force in Skypiea and establishes their role in Enel's system of control.

keyMoments.title: White Berets Defeated
keyMoments.description: The entire White Berets unit is easily defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Hanabi technique, demonstrating their relative weakness compared to Blue Sea pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that while the White Berets enforce the law, they lack the power to stop the Straw Hats, necessitating the involvement of the Priests.

goals: Enforce Skypiea's laws under God Enel

reveals.information: The White Berets are the lowest level of law enforcement in Skypiea, enforcing entry fees and basic laws
White Berets report to the Priests for Class 2 criminal cases
